title: Saga launches over-50s savings deals with unique perks
text:
Saga has today launched two savings deals only available to the over-50s, which also let customers get discounts at shops and restaurants.

The first is an easy access deal paying 1.4pc for one year, and then the rate falls to 1.15pc. The interest rate is the seventh-best available, with the top being the 1.6pc offered by Cynergy Bank. Consumers can pay in and take out money with no restrictions.

The second option is a one-year fixed rate bond paying 1.15pc. Both deals must be opened online, and can then be managed over the internet or by telephone.

Customers can open both accounts with £1 and save up to £100,000 – although balances of more than £85,000 will not be covered by the Financial Services...
description: Saga has today launched two savings deals only available to the over-50s, which also let customers get discounts at shops and restaurants.
